price: Ni uko byagenze. Kandi rwose twari tuzi neza ibye (Dhul Qar’nayni).
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَۖ وَقَدۡ أَحَطۡنَا بِمَا لَدَيۡهِ خُبۡرٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: kadhālika waqad aḥaṭnā bimā ladayhi khub'ran
